title: Ai Ni Zhidao Shijie Jintou
synopsis: Wang Ba Di is the designer of the photo studio (actually it is a P picture). He is withdrawn in appearance but sullen on the inside and is keen to spit out his stomach. He has an amazing special skill: Anything with texture, he can see the pattern and associate it, and come up with a scene and a story. When he broke up with Mu Bei, he was treated for his emotional injury at his brother Wang Xiaolan's house. The frustrated and sloppy traveled in his dreams all day long, contemplating the illusion of happiness with his girlfriend Mu Bei. Under the stimulation of Wang Xiaolan, he determined to contact Mubei again. Will he wait until Mubei's arrival, worrying, what kind of mysterious identity will Wang Xiaolan, who is in the shadows, have? (translated from douban)
